tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_production_studio_inventory (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  storage_location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Studio_Equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Studio_Employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(50),
    hire_date DATE,
    salary DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Studio_Inventory (
    inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inventory_name VARCHAR(50),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  studio_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (studio_id) REFERENCES Studios(studio_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EquipmentAssignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  assignment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  return_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
);
CREATE TABLE StudioLocations ( id INT, location_name VARCHAR(255), address VARCHAR(255), city VARCHAR(100), state VARCHAR(100), zipcode VARCHAR(10) );
CREATE TABLE Equipment ( id INT, equipment_name VARCHAR(255), brand VARCHAR(100), model VARCHAR(100), serial_number VARCHAR(50), price DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE StudioRooms ( id INT, room_number INT, room_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT, location_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES StudioLocations(id) );

CREATE TABLE StudioInventory ( id INT, equipment_id INT, room_id INT, quantity INT, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(id), FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES StudioRooms(id) );
CREATE TABLE StudioEmployees ( id INT, employee_name VARCHAR(255), role VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(20), email VARCHAR(255) );
